description.zh-cn: 隋朝的开国皇帝，统一了分裂长达近三百年的中国，开创了开皇之治。他在位期间进行了一系列改革，包括创立五省六部制和科举制度。
description.en: The founding emperor of the Sui dynasty, who reunified China after nearly three centuries of division and initiated the Kaihuang Era of prosperity. During his reign, he implemented a series of reforms, including the establishment of the Five Departments and Six Ministries system and the imperial examination system.

description.zh-cn: 西魏和北周的将领，隋文帝杨坚的父亲，被追尊为隋武元帝。
description.en: A general of the Western Wei and Northern Zhou dynasties, father of Emperor Wen of Sui (Yang Jian), posthumously honored as Emperor Wuyuan of Sui.

description.zh-cn: 隋文帝杨坚的母亲，被追尊为元明皇后。
description.en: Mother of Emperor Wen of Sui (Yang Jian), posthumously honored as Empress Yuanming.

description.zh-cn: 隋文帝杨坚的皇后，北周八大柱国之一独孤信之女，深度参与政治决策。
description.en: Empress of Emperor Wen of Sui, daughter of Dugu Xin, one of the Eight Pillar Generals of Northern Zhou. She was deeply involved in political decision-making.

description.zh-cn: 由杨坚建立的中国朝代，结束了南北朝的分裂局面，统一了中国。
description.en: A Chinese dynasty founded by Yang Jian that ended the Northern and Southern dynasties period and reunified China.

description.zh-cn: 中国南北朝时期的北朝之一，最后被杨坚篡位，建立隋朝。
description.en: One of the Northern dynasties during the Northern and Southern dynasties period in China, which was eventually usurped by Yang Jian, who established the Sui dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 北周最后一位皇帝，被迫禅位于杨坚。
description.en: The last emperor of the Northern Zhou dynasty, who was forced to abdicate the throne to Yang Jian.

description.zh-cn: 隋朝第二位皇帝，隋文帝杨坚的次子。他在废黜兄长杨勇后成为太子，并继承皇位。
description.en: The second emperor of the Sui dynasty, the second son of Emperor Wen of Sui. He became the crown prince after deposing his elder brother Yang Yong and succeeded to the throne.

description.zh-cn: 隋文帝杨坚的长子，原为太子，后被废黜。
description.en: The eldest son of Emperor Wen of Sui, originally the crown prince, he was later deposed.

description.zh-cn: 中国南北朝时期的南朝最后一个朝代，被隋文帝所灭。
description.en: The last of the Southern Dynasties during the Northern and Southern dynasties period in China, conquered by Emperor Wen of Sui.

description.zh-cn: 中国南北朝时期存在于江陵地区的一个割据政权，后被隋文帝所废。
description.en: A small state that existed in the Jiangling area during the Northern and Southern dynasties period, which was later abolished by Emperor Wen of Sui.

description.zh-cn: 隋文帝在位期间开皇年号下出现的政治稳定、社会经济繁荣的时期。
description.en: A period of political stability and socioeconomic prosperity during the Kaihuang era of Emperor Wen of Sui's reign.

description.zh-cn: 北周末年官员，与郑译等人矫诏拥立杨坚辅政。
description.en: An official in the late Northern Zhou dynasty who, along with Zheng Yi and others, forged an edict to support Yang Jian as regent.

description.zh-cn: 北周末年官员，与刘昉等人矫诏拥立杨坚辅政。
description.en: An official in the late Northern Zhou dynasty who, along with Liu Fang and others, forged an edict to support Yang Jian as regent.

description.zh-cn: 北周将领，杨坚专政后起兵反对，兵败自杀。
description.en: A Northern Zhou general who launched a rebellion against Yang Jian after he took power, but was defeated and committed suicide.

description.zh-cn: 北周赵王，宇文泰之子。曾试图谋杀杨坚未遂，后被杨坚诛杀。
description.en: Prince of Zhao of Northern Zhou, son of Yuwen Tai. He attempted to assassinate Yang Jian but failed, and was later executed by Yang Jian.

description.zh-cn: 北周齐王，曾向北周武帝警示杨坚相貌非常，应尽早除掉。
description.en: Prince of Qi of Northern Zhou, who warned Emperor Wu of Northern Zhou that Yang Jian had an extraordinary appearance and should be eliminated early.

description.zh-cn: 魏晋南北朝时期主要的官员选拔制度，被隋文帝废除。
description.en: The primary system for selecting officials during the Wei, Jin, Northern and Southern dynasties, which was abolished by Emperor Wen of Sui.

description.zh-cn: 通过考试选拔官吏的制度，由隋文帝开创先河。
description.en: A system for selecting officials through examinations, pioneered by Emperor Wen of Sui.

description.zh-cn: 隋文帝杨坚的出生地。
description.en: The birthplace of Emperor Wen of Sui, Yang Jian.

nodes.id: 隋仁寿宫唐九成宫遗址

zh-cn: 隋仁寿宫唐九成宫遗址

description.zh-cn: 隋文帝杨坚的逝世地。
description.en: The place of death of Emperor Wen of Sui, Yang Jian.

description.zh-cn: 尉迟迥的孙女，隋文帝的宫人，被独孤皇后所杀。
description.en: Granddaughter of Yuchi Jiong, a palace lady of Emperor Wen of Sui, who was killed by Empress Dugu.

description.zh-cn: 杨忠是杨坚的父亲。
description.en: Yang Zhong was Yang Jian's father.

description.zh-cn: 吕苦桃是杨坚的母亲。
description.en: Lü Kutao was Yang Jian's mother.

description.zh-cn: 独孤伽罗是杨坚的妻子和皇后。
description.en: Dugu Qieluo was Yang Jian's wife and empress.

description.zh-cn: 杨坚于西魏大统七年（541年）出生在冯翊的般若寺。
description.en: Yang Jian was born in the Banruo Temple in Fengyi in 541, during the Datong era of the Western Wei.

description.zh-cn: 杨坚篡夺北周政权，建立隋朝，改元开皇。
description.en: Yang Jian usurped the Northern Zhou regime, established the Sui dynasty, and changed the era name to Kaihuang.

description.zh-cn: 杨坚逼迫北周静帝禅位，取代北周，并屠杀了北周宇文皇族。
description.en: Yang Jian forced Emperor Jing of Northern Zhou to abdicate, replaced the Northern Zhou, and massacred the Yuwen imperial family of Northern Zhou.

description.zh-cn: 杨坚发动隋灭陈之战，攻占建康，俘虏陈后主，灭亡了陈朝。
description.en: Yang Jian launched the Sui campaign against Chen, captured Jiankang, captured Chen Shubao, and destroyed the Chen dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 杨坚废黜西梁后主萧琮，吞并了西梁政权。
description.en: Yang Jian deposed the last ruler of Western Liang, Xiao Cong, and annexed the state.

description.zh-cn: 北周宣帝驾崩后，刘昉与郑译等人矫诏拥立杨坚辅政，为杨坚夺取政权创造了条件。
description.en: After the death of Emperor Xuan of Northern Zhou, Liu Fang, along with Zheng Yi and others, forged an edict to make Yang Jian regent, creating the conditions for Yang Jian to seize power.

description.zh-cn: 北周宣帝驾崩后，郑译与刘昉等人矫诏拥立杨坚辅政，为杨坚夺取政权创造了条件。
description.en: After the death of Emperor Xuan of Northern Zhou, Zheng Yi, along with Liu Fang and others, forged an edict to make Yang Jian regent, creating the conditions for Yang Jian to seize power.

description.zh-cn: 尉迟迥不满杨坚专政，在相州起兵讨伐杨坚，但最终兵败。
description.en: Dissatisfied with Yang Jian's dictatorship, Yuchi Jiong launched a rebellion against him in Xiangzhou, but was ultimately defeated.

description.zh-cn: 杨坚派兵迅速平定了尉迟迥的叛乱。
description.en: Yang Jian dispatched troops and quickly suppressed Yuchi Jiong's rebellion.

description.zh-cn: 宇文招设下鸿门宴，企图在宴会上刺杀杨坚，但未能成功。
description.en: Yuwen Zhao set up a feast with the intent to assassinate Yang Jian, but the attempt was unsuccessful.

description.zh-cn: 杨坚在得知宇文招的刺杀企图后，诬陷其谋反并将其及诸子诛杀。
description.en: After learning of Yuwen Zhao's assassination attempt, Yang Jian framed him for treason and had him and his sons executed.

description.zh-cn: 杨坚在位期间励精图治，实行了一系列有效的政治经济改革，开创了开皇之治的盛世局面。
description.en: During his reign, Yang Jian governed diligently and implemented a series of effective political and economic reforms, creating the prosperous era known as the Reign of Kaihuang.

description.zh-cn: 杨坚即位后，废除了自魏晋以来施行的九品中正制，以改革官员选拔制度。
description.en: After ascending the throne, Yang Jian abolished the Nine-rank system that had been in place since the Wei and Jin dynasties to reform the official selection system.

description.zh-cn: 杨坚开创了科举制度的先河，规定各州每年向中央选送人才参加考试，合格者录用为官，打破了门阀对官职的垄断。
description.en: Yang Jian pioneered the Imperial Examination system, stipulating that each prefecture should recommend talents to the central government for examinations annually, with successful candidates being appointed as officials, thus breaking the monopoly of aristocratic clans on official positions.

description.zh-cn: 隋文帝杨坚因长子杨勇生活奢华等原因，废黜了他的太子之位。
description.en: Emperor Wen of Sui deposed his eldest son Yang Yong from the position of crown prince due to his extravagant lifestyle and other reasons.

description.zh-cn: 隋文帝杨坚在废黜杨勇后，册立善于伪装的次子杨广（即隋炀帝）为太子。
description.en: After deposing Yang Yong, Emperor Wen of Sui installed his second son Yang Guang (later Emperor Yang), who was skilled at dissimulation, as the crown prince.

description.zh-cn: 有说法称隋文帝杨坚是被其子太子杨广所谋杀。
description.en: It is said that Emperor Wen of Sui was murdered by his son, Crown Prince Yang Guang.

description.zh-cn: 北周齐王宇文宪曾对北周武帝评价杨坚相貌非常，认为他颇为狡诈，请求尽早除掉他。
description.en: Yuwen Xian, Prince of Qi of Northern Zhou, once commented to Emperor Wu of Northern Zhou that Yang Jian had an extraordinary appearance, considered him quite cunning, and requested his early elimination.

description.zh-cn: 独孤皇后杀死了隋文帝的宫人尉迟氏（尉迟迥的孙女）。
description.en: Empress Dugu killed Lady Yuchi, a palace lady of Emperor Wen of Sui (and granddaughter of Yuchi Jiong).
